BadRequest.description: Bad Request — missing required fields, malformed JSON, or validation errors. (no body)

Unauthorized.description: Unauthorized — missing or invalid authentication token. (no body)

NotFound.description: Not Found — the requested resource does not exist. (no body)

TooManyRequests.description: Too Many Requests — rate limit exceeded. (no body)

ServerError.description: Internal Server Error — unexpected error on the server. (no body)
